LOZ 25 N TRI ROA 30 SE LYH AVC 15 NNE RWI 30 E FAY 35 S CLT 55 NW
AND 35 NE CHA 45 SSW LOZ.

THERE IS A MRGL RISK OF SVR TSTMS TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 35 NNW
INL 15 NW BRD 20 ESE VVV MHE 20 SSE BUB 10 W HLC 25 SE GCK 55 SSW
GAG 25 ESE CDS ABI 30 NW SJT 30 NE FST INK 50 NNE ROW 35 ENE LVS 25
N LHX 25 N AKO 60 SSW Y22 BIS 85 NNW DVL.

FSM 35 ESE FYV 20 WNW HRO 15 E UMN SGF 20 SE TBN POF DYR MEM GLH 30
ESE SHV 40 SE GGG GGG PRX 35 SSE MLC RKR 20 E FSM.
